synopsis.longSynopsis: Azur Lane, a combination of all the different Camps in the world, was once successful in repelling the underwater menace, the Siren. Now splintered, they must face a new threat in Red Axis, former allies who crave to wield this otherworldly Siren technology for their own nefarious desires! Who will be victorious in the never-ending war between these battleship girls!?
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Azur Lane was able to overcome the grotesque Siren but is confronted by a new unexpected enemy in Red Axis.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: The major Camps of the world must unite if Azur Lane is to repel the monstrous danger of the Siren. Betrayed by their former confederates, they must now confront a new enemy in Red Axis.

en.longSynopsis: Azur Lane, a combination of all the different Camps in the world, was once successful in repelling the underwater menace, the Siren. Now splintered, they must face a new threat in Red Axis, former allies who crave to wield this otherworldly Siren technology for their own nefarious desires! Who will be victorious in the never-ending war between these battleship girls!?
en.shortSynopsis: Azur Lane was able to overcome the grotesque Siren but is confronted by a new unexpected enemy in Red Axis.
en.mediumSynopsis: The major Camps of the world must unite if Azur Lane is to repel the monstrous danger of the Siren. Betrayed by their former confederates, they must now confront a new enemy in Red Axis.

synopsis.longSynopsis: After a traumatic accident takes his loved one, Tor Kokonoe enrolls Koryo Academy, a school where every student has a weapon that is their soul manifestation. Fueled by his desire for revenge, Tor is dismayed to discover his soul is not a weapon…but a shield.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: After a traumatic accident takes his loved one, Tor enrolls at Koryo Academy, a school where every student's soul manifests as a weapon.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: After a traumatic accident takes his loved one, Tor enrolls Koryo Academy, a school where every student has a weapon that’s their soul manifestation. Fueled by desire for revenge, Tor is dismayed to discover his soul is not a weapon…but a shield.

es.shortSynopsis: Después de que un traumático accidente se lleva a su amada, Tor se inscribe en la Academia Koryo, una escuela donde el alma de cada estudiante se manifiesta como un arma.

pt.shortSynopsis: Depois de perder sua amada em um acidente traumático, Tor se matricula na Koryo Academy, uma escola onde a alma de cada aluno se manifesta como uma arma.

synopsis.longSynopsis: The year is 2046. Haruyuki Arita is a young boy who finds himself on the lowest social rungs of his school. Ashamed of his miserable life, Haruyuki can only cope by indulging in virtual games. But that all changes when Kuroyukihime, the most popular girl in school, introduces him to a mysterious program called Brain Burst and a virtual reality called the Accel World.

Ashamed of his miserable life, Haruyuki can only cope by indulging in virtual games. But that all changes when Kuroyukihime, the most popular girl in school, introduces him to a mysterious program called Brain Burst and a virtual reality called the Accel World.

synopsis.longSynopsis: In the near future, an overflowing court system dictates that all trials can only convene for 3 days - then a verdict must be reached.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: In the near future, an overflowing court system dictates that all trials can only convene for 3 days - then a verdict must be reached.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: In the near future, an overflowing court system dictates that all trials can only convene for 3 days - then a verdict must be reached.

en.longSynopsis: In the near future, an overflowing court system dictates that all trials can only convene for 3 days - then a verdict must be reached.
en.shortSynopsis: In the near future, an overflowing court system dictates that all trials can only convene for 3 days - then a verdict must be reached.
en.mediumSynopsis: In the near future, an overflowing court system dictates that all trials can only convene for 3 days - then a verdict must be reached.

synopsis.longSynopsis: A VOCALOID x voice actors collaboration, featuring songs from EXIT TUNES. Within a sprawling academic metropolis lies an exclusive academy where students are encouraged to join clubs such as singing and archaeology to earn points for recognition. The most important of these is the big singing contest where all contestants have to sing in front of the entire school!
synopsis.shortSynopsis: A VOCALOID x voice actors collaboration, featuring songs from EXIT TUNES performed by competing students in their great singing contest.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: A VOCALOID x voice actors collaboration, featuring songs from EXIT TUNES. At a prestigious academy, students join clubs to earn points for status. The biggest event though, is the singing challenge where they can perform in front of the whole school!

en.longSynopsis: A VOCALOID x voice actors collaboration, featuring songs from EXIT TUNES. Within a sprawling academic metropolis lies an exclusive academy where students are encouraged to join clubs such as singing and archaeology to earn points for recognition. The most important of these is the big singing contest where all contestants have to sing in front of the entire school!
en.shortSynopsis: A VOCALOID x voice actors collaboration, featuring songs from EXIT TUNES performed by competing students in their great singing contest.
en.mediumSynopsis: A VOCALOID x voice actors collaboration, featuring songs from EXIT TUNES. At a prestigious academy, students join clubs to earn points for status. The biggest event though, is the singing challenge where they can perform in front of the whole school!

synopsis.longSynopsis: Adachi spends her school days skipping class until she meets fellow delinquent Shimamura and the two become fast friends. Cutting class together deepens their friendship but soon unexpected emotions blossom. As awkwardness and confusion settle in, the two girls travel this sea of emotions without a paddle as they learn about each other’s feelings.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Adachi and Shimamura become friends, but soon new feelings blossom. They travel the sea of emotions as they learn each other’s feelings.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Adachi spends her days skipping class until she meets fellow delinquent Shimamura and the two become friends. Cutting class together deepens the bond but unexpected emotions blossom. The two travel this sea of emotions and learn each other’s feelings.

ru.longSynopsis: Судьбы двух известных прогульщиц, Адати и Симамуры, переплетаются, когда девочки сталкиваются на втором этаже школьного спортзала. С тех самых пор за игрой в пинг-понг и развлечениями начала расти их дружба. Но как они отреагируют, если однажды их отношения вдруг изменятся?..
ru.shortSynopsis: Судьбы двух известных прогульщиц, Адати и Симамуры, переплетаются, когда девочки сталкиваются на втором этаже школьного спортзала. С тех самых пор за игрой в пинг-понг и развлечениями начала расти их дружба. Но как они отреагируют, если однажды их отношения вдруг изменятся?..
ru.mediumSynopsis: Судьбы двух известных прогульщиц, Адати и Симамуры, переплетаются, когда девочки сталкиваются на втором этаже школьного спортзала. С тех самых пор за игрой в пинг-понг и развлечениями начала расти их дружба. Но как они отреагируют, если однажды их отношения вдруг изменятся?..

fr.longSynopsis: Connues pour sécher régulièrement les cours, deux jeunes filles nommées Adachi et Shimamura voient leur vie s’entrelacer lorsqu’elles se croisent au deuxième étage du gymnase de leur lycée. À ce moment-là, c’est le début d’une grande amitié ; elles jouent au ping-pong, traînent ensemble après les cours... Mais si quelque chose arrivait et devait changer leur relation à jamais, comment réagiraient-elles ?
fr.shortSynopsis: Connues pour sécher régulièrement les cours, deux jeunes filles nommées Adachi et Shimamura voient leur vie s’entrelacer lorsqu’elles se croisent au deuxième étage du gymnase de leur lycée. À ce moment-là, c’est le début d’une grande amitié ; elles jouent au ping-pong, traînent ensemble après les cours... Mais si quelque chose arrivait et devait changer leur relation à jamais, comment réagiraient-elles ?
fr.mediumSynopsis: Connues pour sécher régulièrement les cours, deux jeunes filles nommées Adachi et Shimamura voient leur vie s’entrelacer lorsqu’elles se croisent au deuxième étage du gymnase de leur lycée. À ce moment-là, c’est le début d’une grande amitié ; elles jouent au ping-pong, traînent ensemble après les cours... Mais si quelque chose arrivait et devait changer leur relation à jamais, comment réagiraient-elles ?

de.longSynopsis: Da sie beide häufig die Schule schwänzen, treffen sich Adachi und Shimamura zufällig im oberen Bereich der Turnhalle. Die Freundschaft zwischen den Mädchen beginnt zu wachsen, als sie immer öfter Zeit miteinander verbringen und gemeinsam Tischtennis spielen. Doch dann geschieht etwas, dass die Beziehung zwischen den Mädchen verändert…
de.shortSynopsis: Da sie beide häufig die Schule schwänzen, treffen sich Adachi und Shimamura zufällig im oberen Bereich der Turnhalle. Die Freundschaft zwischen den Mädchen beginnt zu wachsen, als sie immer öfter Zeit miteinander verbringen und gemeinsam Tischtennis spielen. Doch dann geschieht etwas, dass die Beziehung zwischen den Mädchen verändert…

Cutting class together deepens their friendship but soon unexpected emotions blossom. As awkwardness and confusion settle in, the two girls travel this sea of emotions without a paddle as they learn about each other’s feelings.
en.shortSynopsis: Adachi and Shimamura become friends, but soon new feelings blossom. They travel the sea of emotions as they learn each other’s feelings.
en.mediumSynopsis: Adachi spends her days skipping class until she meets fellow delinquent Shimamura and the two become friends. Cutting class together deepens the bond but unexpected emotions blossom. The two travel this sea of emotions and learn each other’s feelings.

pt.shortSynopsis: Adachi passa seus dias matando aula quando encontra outra delinquente, Shimamura, e as duas se tornam amigas. Matar aula juntas aprofunda o relacionamento delas, mas sentimentos inesperados surgem. As duas navegam por esse mar de emoções e aprendem sobre os sentimentos uma da outra.
pt.mediumSynopsis: Adachi passa seus dias matando aula quando encontra outra delinquente, Shimamura, e as duas se tornam amigas rapidamente. Matar aula juntas aprofunda o relacionamento delas, mas sentimentos inesperados surgem. Quando desconforto e confusão começam a surgir, as duas navegam por esse mar de emoções sem remos, e aprendem sobre os sentimentos uma da outra.

es.shortSynopsis: Adachi y Shimamura se conocen en el segundo piso del gimnasio escolar mientras se saltan clases. Gradualmente, comienzan a verse cada vez más y comienzan a jugar ping pong juntas.
es.mediumSynopsis: Shimamura, una compañera igualmente malportada, y ambas se hacen amigas. Escapar juntas de clases profundiza su vínculo, pero brotan emociones inesperadas. Las dos transitan este mar de emociones y aprenden sobre sus sentimientos mutuos.

synopsis.shortSynopsis: Ohtorizawa Akatsuki is about to find out that sometimes the greatest adventure starts after the happy ending.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Hero defeats bad guy. Good triumphs over evil. The end. Or, at least that's how it usually goes.  But what happens after the hero goes home? Ohtorizawa Akatsuki, is about to find out that sometimes the greatest adventure starts after the happy ending.

en.shortSynopsis: Ohtorizawa Akatsuki is about to find out that sometimes the greatest adventure starts after the happy ending.
en.mediumSynopsis: Hero defeats bad guy. Good triumphs over evil. The end. Or, at least that's how it usually goes.  But what happens after the hero goes home? Ohtorizawa Akatsuki, is about to find out that sometimes the greatest adventure starts after the happy ending.

synopsis.longSynopsis: Imagine your co-workers–a lion, toucan, and lizard! Hey it can happen right? Africa Salaryman is a comedic take on office life of three African jungle animals who could be your potential co-workers in corporate America. It’s full of ridiculous office place antics and hilarious scenarios, that keeps things quite entertaining, while the animals cope with their working environment.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Africa Salaryman is a comedic take on office life of three African jungle animals who could be your co-workers in corporate America.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Imagine your co-workers–a lion, toucan, and lizard! Hey! It can happen right? Africa Salaryman is a comedic take on office life of three African jungle animals who could be your potential co-workers in corporate America.

es.shortSynopsis: Africa Salaryman es una versión cómica de la vida de oficina de tres animales de la jungla africana que podrían ser sus compañeros de trabajo en la América corporativa.

pt.shortSynopsis: Africa Salaryman é uma abordagem cômica da vida no escritório de três animais da selva africana que poderiam muito bem ser seus colegas de trabalho na América corporativa.

synopsis.shortSynopsis: As a kid, he saw his father slaughtered. Now a man, Afro journeys to face destiny. The perpetrators are gonna get what they deserve.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: He’s a legend with an ice cold soul and a jones for revenge: Afro Samurai. As a kid, he saw his father slaughtered. Now a man, Afro journeys to the mountain to face destiny. The perpetrators are gonna get what they deserve. Starring Samuel L. Jackson.

en.shortSynopsis: As a kid, he saw his father slaughtered. Now a man, Afro journeys to face destiny. The perpetrators are gonna get what they deserve.
en.mediumSynopsis: He’s a legend with an ice cold soul and a jones for revenge: Afro Samurai. As a kid, he saw his father slaughtered. Now a man, Afro journeys to the mountain to face destiny. The perpetrators are gonna get what they deserve. Starring Samuel L. Jackson.

synopsis.longSynopsis: During a beautiful spring day in Kyoto, Aya and Miki follow the student council president Midori to a board game shop. The three students end up discovering a German board game that causes them to realize their shared passion for games. In the coming days, many more board games will be found and played!
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Three students, Aya, Miki, and Midori go to a board game shop in Kyoto. They discover a German board game and realize their shared passion for games.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: During a beautiful day in Kyoto, Aya and Miki follow the student council president Midori to a board game shop. The three students discover a German board game and realize their shared passion for games. Many more board games will be found and played!

fr.longSynopsis: Elle a toujours été seule. C'est là le quotidien de Takekasa Miki, une introvertie qui n'est pas à l'aise avec d'autres gens. Jusqu'à ce qu'elle rencontre Takayashiki Aya, une camarade de classe candide, Ôno Midori, la déléguée de classe, et Emilia, qui vient d'Allemagne. Elles vont se lier d'amitié au travers de jeux de société, qui vont beaucoup aider Miki.
fr.shortSynopsis: Elle a toujours été seule. C'est là le quotidien de Takekasa Miki, une introvertie qui n'est pas à l'aise avec d'autres gens. Jusqu'à ce qu'elle rencontre Takayashiki Aya, une camarade de classe candide, Ôno Midori, la déléguée de classe, et Emilia, qui vient d'Allemagne. Elles vont se lier d'amitié au travers de jeux de société, qui vont beaucoup aider Miki.

Elles vont se lier d'amitié au travers de jeux de société, qui vont beaucoup aider Miki.

de.longSynopsis: Takekasa Miki ist ein in sich verschlossenes Mädchen, dass sich schwer dabei tut, Bindungen einzugehen. Darum war es für sie selbstverständlich, ihren Alltag alleine zu verbringen. Aber dann begegnet Miki ihrer naiven Klassenkameradin, Takayashiki Aya, der Klassensprecherin, Ono Midori und der Schulwechslerin aus Deutschland, Emilia. Gemeinsam vertiefen sie ihre Freundschaft durch Brettspiele und schreiten Stück für Stück im Leben voran. Daraufhin nimmt Mikis natürlicher Alltag ganz besondere Züge an.

hits.title: Ah! My Goddess: Flights of Fancy

synopsis.longSynopsis: The song may say "thank heaven for little girls", but who is college student Keiichi Morisato supposed to thank when three honest to goodness Goddesses move in and take over his life? After all, according to most mythologies, relationships between mortals and immortals usually leads to mortifying complications, so we're already talking about an extremely mixed blessing!
synopsis.shortSynopsis: When three Goddesses move in and take over his life, Keiichi can't decide if he should really be all that grateful.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: When three Goddesses move in and take over his life, Keiichi can't decide if he should really be all that grateful. After all, in most mythologies, relationships between mortals and immortals usually lead to mortifying complications!

en.longSynopsis: The song may say "thank heaven for little girls", but who is college student Keiichi Morisato supposed to thank when three honest to goodness Goddesses move in and take over his life? After all, according to most mythologies, relationships between mortals and immortals usually leads to mortifying complications, so we're already talking about an extremely mixed blessing!
en.shortSynopsis: When three Goddesses move in and take over his life, Keiichi can't decide if he should really be all that grateful.
en.mediumSynopsis: When three Goddesses move in and take over his life, Keiichi can't decide if he should really be all that grateful. After all, in most mythologies, relationships between mortals and immortals usually lead to mortifying complications!

synopsis.longSynopsis: Thanks to Washu, the universe has been thrown into chaos and it’s up to Tenchi to clean up the mess. But to do so he’s going undercover as a teacher—at an all-girl’s school! What awaits him beyond the attention of cute girls at this not-so-ordinary school? And will he be able to balance timelines and trouble that come with this latest adventure? Join the harem and the fun in this series of shorts!
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Tenchi is back in a brand-new world with new adventures and new fawning girls in this series of shorts!
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: To save the universe, Tenchi is going undercover—at an all-girl’s school! Can he survive the attention of cute girls at this not-so-ordinary school and put the timelines back into balance? Join the harem and fun in this series of shorts!

What awaits him beyond the attention of cute girls at this not-so-ordinary school? And will he be able to balance timelines and trouble that come with this latest adventure? Join the harem and the fun in this series of shorts!

en.mediumSynopsis: To save the universe, Tenchi is going undercover—at an all-girl’s school! Can he survive the attention of cute girls at this not-so-ordinary school and put the timelines back into balance? Join the harem and fun in this series of shorts!

synopsis.longSynopsis: Kaoru is a college boy living with his fiancé Aoi, but family complications are forcing them to keep their engagement secret. Countless steamy situations arise as a variety of babes start moving in to their mansion. They can’t get enough of Kaoru—they’re even invading his bed! Two is company and eight is a party in this romping romance brought to you by the director of Saber Marionette J.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Kaoru is a college boy living with his fiancé, but their secret engagement is threatened when cute girls with eyes for Karou move in!
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Kaoru is a college boy living with his fiancé Aoi, but family complications are forcing them to keep their engagement secret. Countless steamy situations arise as a variety of babes start moving in to their mansion. They can’t get enough of Kaoru!

en.mediumSynopsis: Kaoru is a college boy living with his fiancé Aoi, but family complications are forcing them to keep their engagement secret. Countless steamy situations arise as a variety of babes start moving in to their mansion. They can’t get enough of Kaoru!

synopsis.longSynopsis: Tough guy Ikki rules his school, but when he’s defeated by a gang of Storm Riders, the four sisters he lives with welcome him to the world of Air Trecks—motor-powered inline skates. With his powerful new wings, Ikki fights for his friends and his pride in fierce Air Treck battles. One mistake could cost him everything, but each victory brings him closer to becoming the king of the sky.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Ikki rules his school, but when he’s defeated by Storm Riders, he’s introduced to the world of Air Trecks—motor-powered inline skates.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Ikki rules his school, but when he’s defeated by a gang of Storm Riders, he’s introduced to the world of Air Trecks—motor-powered inline skates. He’ll fight for his pride in fierce Air Treck battles, but one mistake could cost him everything.

hits.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor

synopsis.longSynopsis: The new teacher at a magical academy has a rather unorthodox approach to education. Even though his students are driven to learn, he prefers to write instructions on the chalkboard then nap during class. His evident laziness and overall incompetence frustrate his students. However, when a terrible incident threatens the school, he shows a new side to himself that takes everyone by surprise.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: The new teacher at a magical academy doesn’t seem to care about anything until a threat to the school shows a whole new side of him.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: The new teacher at a magical academy has an unorthodox approach to education. Even though his students are driven to learn, he prefers to nap during class. When a terrible incident threatens the school, he shows a side to himself that surprises everyone.

en.longSynopsis: The new teacher at a magical academy has a rather unorthodox approach to education. Even though his students are driven to learn, he prefers to write instructions on the chalkboard then nap during class. His evident laziness and overall incompetence frustrate his students. However, when a terrible incident threatens the school, he shows a new side to himself that takes everyone by surprise.
en.shortSynopsis: The new teacher at a magical academy doesn’t seem to care about anything until a threat to the school shows a whole new side of him.
en.mediumSynopsis: The new teacher at a magical academy has an unorthodox approach to education. Even though his students are driven to learn, he prefers to nap during class. When a terrible incident threatens the school, he shows a side to himself that surprises everyone.

synopsis.longSynopsis: It’s Komichi Akebi’s first year of junior high and she has her heart set on one thing: Robai Private Academy’s sailor uniform. As the next chapter of her life gets closer, she dreams of all the exciting new experiences she’ll get to have—school lunches, classes, club activities, and of course, making lots of friends! With her favorite outfit on, Komichi feels ready for anything.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: With her sailor uniform on, Komichi Akebi is ready for anything. Even her first day at the prestigious Robai Private Academy!
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: It’s Komichi Akebi’s first year of junior high and she has her heart set on one thing: Robai Private Academy’s sailor uniform. As the next chapter of her life arrives, she dreams of all the new experiences she’ll have—most of all, making lots of friends!

es.longSynopsis: Es el primer año de secundaria de Komichi Akebi y ella tiene su corazón puesto en una cosa: el uniforme de marinero de la Academia Privada Roubai. A medida que se acerca el próximo capítulo de su vida, sueña con todas las nuevas y emocionantes experiencias que tendrá: almuerzos escolares, clases, actividades en clubes y, por supuesto, ¡hacer muchos amigos! Con su atuendo favorito, Komichi se siente lista para cualquier cosa.
es.shortSynopsis: Con su uniforme de marinero, Komichi Akebi está lista para cualquier cosa. ¡Incluso su primer día en la prestigiosa Academia Privada Roubai!
es.mediumSynopsis: Es el primer año de secundaria de Komichi Akebi y ella tiene su corazón puesto en una cosa: el uniforme de marinero de la Academia Privada Roubai. Cuando llega el próximo capítulo de su vida, sueña con todas las nuevas experiencias que tendrá; sobre todo, ¡hacer muchos amigos!

en.longSynopsis: It’s Komichi Akebi’s first year of junior high and she has her heart set on one thing: Robai Private Academy’s sailor uniform. As the next chapter of her life gets closer, she dreams of all the exciting new experiences she’ll get to have—school lunches, classes, club activities, and of course, making lots of friends! With her favorite outfit on, Komichi feels ready for anything.
en.shortSynopsis: With her sailor uniform on, Komichi Akebi is ready for anything. Even her first day at the prestigious Robai Private Academy!
en.mediumSynopsis: It’s Komichi Akebi’s first year of junior high and she has her heart set on one thing: Robai Private Academy’s sailor uniform. As the next chapter of her life arrives, she dreams of all the new experiences she’ll have—most of all, making lots of friends!

pt.longSynopsis: É o primeiro ano do ensino fundamental de Komichi Akebi e ela quer uma coisa: o uniforme de marinheiro da Academia Robai. Conforme o próximo capítulo de sua vida se aproxima, ela sonha com todas as experiências novas e emocionantes que terá - almoços escolares, aulas, atividades do clube e, claro, fazer muitos amigos! Com sua roupa favorita, Komichi se sente pronta para qualquer coisa.
pt.shortSynopsis: Com seu uniforme de marinheiro, Komichi Akebi está pronta para tudo. Até mesmo seu primeiro dia na prestigiosa Academia Robai!
pt.mediumSynopsis: É o primeiro ano do ensino fundamental de Komichi Akebi e ela quer uma coisa: o uniforme de marinheiro da Academia Robai. Conforme o próximo capítulo de sua vida chega, ela sonha com todas as novas experiências que terá - acima de tudo, fazer muitos amigos!

synopsis.longSynopsis: Based off the hit game comes a new series about the danger lurking in the Otaku heaven of Akihabara. Vampires with an ability to take over anyone they bite seek their prey in this anime fan’s paradise. When Tamotsu Denkigai encounters one, he nearly loses his life until the mysterious Matome Mayonaka revives him! Now part vampire, he forms a group to protect the streets of Akiba.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: After being attacked by a vampire, Tamotsu Denkigai is stuck in Akihabara fighting to keep the streets safe.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: When Tamotsu Denkigai encounters vampires with an ability to take over anyone they bite, he nearly loses his life until the mysterious Matome Mayonaka revives him! Now, stuck in Akiba as a vampire, he forms a group to protect the streets.

fr.longSynopsis: Dans une reproduction du célèbre quartier de Tokyo, Akihabara, un groupe de jeunes personnes combat les vampires ayant envahi la ville. Leur arme principale ? Celle de retirer leurs vêtements afin de les exposer à la lumière du soleil.
fr.shortSynopsis: Dans une reproduction du célèbre quartier de Tokyo, Akihabara, un groupe de jeunes personnes combat les vampires ayant envahi la ville. Leur arme principale ? Celle de retirer leurs vêtements afin de les exposer à la lumière du soleil.
fr.mediumSynopsis: Dans une reproduction du célèbre quartier de Tokyo, Akihabara, un groupe de jeunes personnes combat les vampires ayant envahi la ville. Leur arme principale ? Celle de retirer leurs vêtements afin de les exposer à la lumière du soleil.

en.longSynopsis: Based off the hit game comes a new series about the danger lurking in the Otaku heaven of Akihabara. Vampires with an ability to take over anyone they bite seek their prey in this anime fan’s paradise. When Tamotsu Denkigai encounters one, he nearly loses his life until the mysterious Matome Mayonaka revives him! Now part vampire, he forms a group to protect the streets of Akiba.
en.shortSynopsis: After being attacked by a vampire, Tamotsu Denkigai is stuck in Akihabara fighting to keep the streets safe.
en.mediumSynopsis: When Tamotsu Denkigai encounters vampires with an ability to take over anyone they bite, he nearly loses his life until the mysterious Matome Mayonaka revives him! Now, stuck in Akiba as a vampire, he forms a group to protect the streets.

pt.shortSynopsis: Tamotsu Denkigai é atacado por um vampiro e fica preso em Akihabara, lutando para proteger as ruas..

es.shortSynopsis: A Tamotsu Denkigai lo ataca un vampiro y queda varado en Akihabara, luchando por proteger las calles.

synopsis.longSynopsis: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious being with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation. As a result, a biker with a twisted mind embarks on a path of war, seeking revenge against a society what once called him weak.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: In Neo-Tokyo, a biker with a twisted mind embarks on a path of war, seeking revenge against a society that once called him weak.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious being with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

en.longSynopsis: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious being with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation. As a result, a biker with a twisted mind embarks on a path of war, seeking revenge against a society what once called him weak.
en.shortSynopsis: In Neo-Tokyo, a biker with a twisted mind embarks on a path of war, seeking revenge against a society that once called him weak.
en.mediumSynopsis: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious being with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

synopsis.longSynopsis: Many years ago, a Great Civil War ravaged Japan, leaving the country fragmented between two regions: Kansai and Kanto. In Kansai, a group of six Akudama carry out missions given to them by a mysterious black cat, while evading the police. But a dangerous journey is about to unfold when a civilian girl becomes twisted into the Akudama's way of life and witnesses their criminal drives.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: A dangerous journey is about to begin when a civilian gets twisted into the Akudama way of life and witnesses their criminal drives.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Six criminals known as Akudama receive missions given to them by a mysterious black cat. But a dangerous journey is about to begin when a civilian girl becomes twisted into the Akudama way of life and witnesses their criminal drives.

ru.longSynopsis: В далекой древности между Канто и Кансаем вспыхнула война, разделившая Японию на две части. В конечном итоге Кансай проиграл и утратил самостоятельность. Постепенно его правительство и полиция стали уступать всё возрастающей преступности... Акудама — так стали называть злодеев, которые пытаются поставить мир с ног на голову.
ru.shortSynopsis: В далекой древности между Канто и Кансаем вспыхнула война, разделившая Японию на две части. В конечном итоге Кансай проиграл и утратил самостоятельность. Постепенно его правительство и полиция стали уступать всё возрастающей преступности... Акудама — так стали называть злодеев, которые пытаются поставить мир с ног на голову.
ru.mediumSynopsis: В далекой древности между Канто и Кансаем вспыхнула война, разделившая Японию на две части. В конечном итоге Кансай проиграл и утратил самостоятельность. Постепенно его правительство и полиция стали уступать всё возрастающей преступности... Акудама — так стали называть злодеев, которые пытаются поставить мир с ног на голову.

fr.longSynopsis: Il y a longtemps, la guerre entre les régions du Kantou et du Kansai a divisé le Japon en deux. Suite aux affrontements, le Kansai est devenu dépendant du Kantou. Mais petit à petit, les membres du gouvernement et la police du Kansai ont commencé à perdre le contrôle… et depuis la criminalité, ne cesse d’augmenter. Les nouveaux malfaiteurs se font appeler Akudama, et ils ont bien l’intention de mettre la ville sens dessus dessous.
fr.shortSynopsis: Il y a longtemps, la guerre entre les régions du Kantou et du Kansai a divisé le Japon en deux. Suite aux affrontements, le Kansai est devenu dépendant du Kantou. Mais petit à petit, les membres du gouvernement et la police du Kansai ont commencé à perdre le contrôle… et depuis la criminalité, ne cesse d’augmenter. Les nouveaux malfaiteurs se font appeler Akudama, et ils ont bien l’intention de mettre la ville sens dessus dessous.

In Kansai, a group of six Akudama carry out missions given to them by a mysterious black cat, while evading the police. But a dangerous journey is about to unfold when a civilian girl becomes twisted into the Akudama's way of life and witnesses their criminal drives.
en.shortSynopsis: A dangerous journey is about to begin when a civilian gets twisted into the Akudama way of life and witnesses their criminal drives.
en.mediumSynopsis: Six criminals known as Akudama receive missions given to them by a mysterious black cat. But a dangerous journey is about to begin when a civilian girl becomes twisted into the Akudama way of life and witnesses their criminal drives.

pt.shortSynopsis: Uma jornada perigosa está para começar quando uma civil se envolve no modo de vida Akudama e testemunha seus impulsos criminosos.

es.shortSynopsis: Un viaje peligroso está a punto de comenzar cuando una civil se retuerce en el estilo de vida Akudama y es testigo de sus impulsos criminales.

synopsis.longSynopsis: The lazy, womanizing Ikta Solork is about as far from a soldier as you can get. But with the Katjvarna Empire now at war with a neighboring country, he and his friends are on their way to join the army. As luck would have it, Ikta’s natural wit and a sudden encounter with the Empire’s last princess burdens him with a responsibility he never asked for.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: The lazy, womanizing Ikta Solork is no soldier, but his wit and a sudden encounter with a princess land him squarely in the midst of war.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: The lazy, womanizing Ikta Solork is about as far from a soldier as you can get. But with the Katjvarna Empire now at war, his natural wit and a sudden encounter with the Empire’s last princess burdens him with a responsibility he never asked for.

en.longSynopsis: The lazy, womanizing Ikta Solork is about as far from a soldier as you can get. But with the Katjvarna Empire now at war with a neighboring country, he and his friends are on their way to join the army. As luck would have it, Ikta’s natural wit and a sudden encounter with the Empire’s last princess burdens him with a responsibility he never asked for.
en.shortSynopsis: The lazy, womanizing Ikta Solork is no soldier, but his wit and a sudden encounter with a princess land him squarely in the midst of war.
en.mediumSynopsis: The lazy, womanizing Ikta Solork is about as far from a soldier as you can get. But with the Katjvarna Empire now at war, his natural wit and a sudden encounter with the Empire’s last princess burdens him with a responsibility he never asked for.

synopsis.longSynopsis: When trouble comes knocking, do you answer? What if that trouble is Sana, a little girl with the power to materialize anything she imagines? Old man Zoroku would prefer a quiet life, but even he can’t turn away when the escaped test subject ends up in his care. As the unlikely duo make do, their friendship takes root. But first, Sana must learn to use her powers responsibly.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Old man Zoroku would prefer a quiet life, but even he can’t turn away when Sana, an escaped test subject, ends up in his care.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Old man Zoroku would prefer a quiet life, but even he can’t turn away when an escaped test subject ends up in his care. Sana’s ability to materialize anything may seem like a gift, but first she must learn to use her powers responsibly.

en.longSynopsis: When trouble comes knocking, do you answer? What if that trouble is Sana, a little girl with the power to materialize anything she imagines? Old man Zoroku would prefer a quiet life, but even he can’t turn away when the escaped test subject ends up in his care. As the unlikely duo make do, their friendship takes root. But first, Sana must learn to use her powers responsibly.
en.shortSynopsis: Old man Zoroku would prefer a quiet life, but even he can’t turn away when Sana, an escaped test subject, ends up in his care.
en.mediumSynopsis: Old man Zoroku would prefer a quiet life, but even he can’t turn away when an escaped test subject ends up in his care. Sana’s ability to materialize anything may seem like a gift, but first she must learn to use her powers responsibly.

synopsis.longSynopsis: In Medieval Japan, savage aliens crash a forest full of the fiercest ninjas of the Iga clan. Swords and throwing stars may fail against these unearthly goons, but ninja skills don’t stop at sharp stuff. If you’re into Army of Darkness, you’ll be taking bets on who’ll win this over-the-top battle for survival!
synopsis.shortSynopsis: In medieval Japan, savage aliens crash a forest full of the fiercest ninjas. Who will win this extreme battle for survival?
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: In Medieval Japan, savage aliens crash a forest full of the fiercest ninjas. Swords and throwing stars may fail against the unearthly goons, but ninja skills don’t stop at sharp stuff. You’ll be taking bets on who’ll win this extreme battle for survival!

synopsis.longSynopsis: When monstrous creatures from deep space terrorize earth, a chosen group of soldiers called the Ancient Girls must protect everyone. Trained to pilot specialized mecha, Gs Frames, these girls are humanity’s last hope. Will their sacrifice be deliverance?
synopsis.shortSynopsis: When monstrous creatures from deep space terrorize earth, a chosen group of soldiers called the Ancient Girls become humanity’s only hope.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: When monstrous creatures from deep space terrorize earth, a chosen group of soldiers called the Ancient Girls must protect everyone. Trained to pilot specialized mecha, Gs Frames, these girls are humanity’s last hope. Will their sacrifice be deliverance?

es.longSynopsis: Cuando monstruosas criaturas del espacio profundo aterrorizan a la Tierra, un grupo elegido de soldados llamados Ancient Girls debe protegerlos a todos. Formadas para pilotar mechas especializados, Prototipos G, estas chicas son la última esperanza de la humanidad. ¿Será su sacrificio la salvación?
es.shortSynopsis: Cuando monstruosas criaturas del espacio profundo aterrorizan a la Tierra, un grupo elegido de soldados llamados Ancient Girls se convierte en la única esperanza de la humanidad.
es.mediumSynopsis: Cuando monstruosas criaturas del espacio profundo aterrorizan a la Tierra, un grupo elegido de soldados llamados Ancient Girls debe protegerlos a todos. Formadas para pilotar mechas especializados, Prototipos G, estas chicas son la última esperanza de la humanidad. ¿Será su sacrificio la salvación?

en.longSynopsis: When monstrous creatures from deep space terrorize earth, a chosen group of soldiers called the Ancient Girls must protect everyone. Trained to pilot specialized mecha, Gs Frames, these girls are humanity’s last hope. Will their sacrifice be deliverance?
en.shortSynopsis: When monstrous creatures from deep space terrorize earth, a chosen group of soldiers called the Ancient Girls become humanity’s only hope.
en.mediumSynopsis: When monstrous creatures from deep space terrorize earth, a chosen group of soldiers called the Ancient Girls must protect everyone. Trained to pilot specialized mecha, Gs Frames, these girls are humanity’s last hope. Will their sacrifice be deliverance?

pt.longSynopsis: Quando criaturas monstruosas do espaço aterrorizam a Terra, um grupo de soldadas escolhidas, chamadas Ancient Girls, têm que proteger a todos. Treinadas para pilotar mechas especializados, Gs Frames, essas garotas são a última esperança da humanidade. O sacrifício delas será a liberdade de todos?
pt.shortSynopsis: Quando criaturas monstruosas do espaço aterrorizam a Terra, um grupo de soldadas escolhidas, chamadas Ancient Girls, é a última esperança da humanidade.

Treinadas para pilotar mechas especializados, Gs Frames, essas garotas são a última esperança da humanidade. O sacrifício delas será a liberdade de todos?

hits.title: And you thought there is never a girl online?

titleExt.es: And You Thought There Is Never A Girl Online
titleExt.pt: And You Thought There Is Never A Girl Online

synopsis.longSynopsis: After Hideki Nishimura confesses to a girl online, he is shocked when she turns out to be a boy. Traumatized, he swears to never trust any “girl” players. That is, until one confesses to him! Ako Tamaki is a beautiful loner who has trouble differentiating between what’s reality and the online world she spends so much of her time in. Can Hideki and his guild friends help fix socially inept Ako?
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Hideki can’t trust online girls, but when Ako confesses to him, he might reconsider. First, he has to fix her serious lack of social skills!
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: After an online confession goes wrong for Hideki, he vows to never trust any “girls” he meets virtually. Until one confesses to him! But the beautiful Ako has issues of her own; like not being able to tell the difference between online and reality.

en.longSynopsis: After Hideki Nishimura confesses to a girl online, he is shocked when she turns out to be a boy. Traumatized, he swears to never trust any “girl” players. That is, until one confesses to him! Ako Tamaki is a beautiful loner who has trouble differentiating between what’s reality and the online world she spends so much of her time in. Can Hideki and his guild friends help fix socially inept Ako?
en.shortSynopsis: Hideki can’t trust online girls, but when Ako confesses to him, he might reconsider. First, he has to fix her serious lack of social skills!
en.mediumSynopsis: After an online confession goes wrong for Hideki, he vows to never trust any “girls” he meets virtually. Until one confesses to him! But the beautiful Ako has issues of her own; like not being able to tell the difference between online and reality.

es.shortSynopsis: Hideki no confía en las chichas de Internet, pero, cuando Ako le confiesa algo, quizá se replantee esto. Primero, tiene que ayudarla con su falta de habilidades sociales.

pt.shortSynopsis: Hideki não confia em garotas on-line, mas quando Ako se declara a ele, talvez ele reconsidere. Primeiro, ele tem de dar um jeito na grande falta de habilidades sociais dela!

synopsis.longSynopsis: Otonashi wakes up in the afterlife to find out he has no memories of his life before death. Desperate to survive in a war that could yield another unfortunate fate, he joins the SSS in the battle against Angel, whose very mission is to destroy all inhabitants of this afterlife. As Otonashi struggles to recover his memory and learn more about this world, he finds that not all is as it had seemed.
synopsis.shortSynopsis: Otonashi wakes up in the afterlife and can’t remember his life before death. Desperate to survive, he joins the SSS to fight against Angel.
synopsis.mediumSynopsis: Otonashi wakes up in the afterlife to find out he has no memories of his life before death. Desperate to survive in a war that could yield another unfortunate fate, he joins the SSS in the battle against Angel.

es.longSynopsis: Otonashi se despierta en el más allá para descubrir que no tiene recuerdos de su vida antes de la muerte. Desesperado por sobrevivir en una guerra que podría traer otro destino desafortunado, se une a la SSS en la batalla contra Angel, cuya misión es destruir a todos los habitantes de esta otra vida. Mientras Otonashi lucha por recuperar la memoria y aprender más sobre este mundo, descubre que no todo es como parecía.
es.shortSynopsis: Otonashi despierta en el más allá y no puede recordar su vida antes de la muerte. Desesperado por sobrevivir, se une al SSS para luchar contra Angel.
es.mediumSynopsis: Otonashi se despierta en el más allá para descubrir que no tiene recuerdos de su vida antes de la muerte. Desesperado por sobrevivir en una guerra que podría traer otro destino desafortunado, se une al SSS en la batalla contra Angel.

en.longSynopsis: Otonashi wakes up in the afterlife to find out he has no memories of his life before death. Desperate to survive in a war that could yield another unfortunate fate, he joins the SSS in the battle against Angel, whose very mission is to destroy all inhabitants of this afterlife. As Otonashi struggles to recover his memory and learn more about this world, he finds that not all is as it had seemed.
en.shortSynopsis: Otonashi wakes up in the afterlife and can’t remember his life before death. Desperate to survive, he joins the SSS to fight against Angel.
en.mediumSynopsis: Otonashi wakes up in the afterlife to find out he has no memories of his life before death. Desperate to survive in a war that could yield another unfortunate fate, he joins the SSS in the battle against Angel.

pt.longSynopsis: Otonashi acorda na vida após a morte e descobre que não tem memórias de sua vida antes da morte. Desesperado para sobreviver em uma guerra que poderia acabar em outro destino infeliz, ele se junta à SSS na batalha contra o Anjo, cuja missão é destruir todos os habitantes desta vida após a morte. Enquanto Otonashi luta para recuperar sua memória e aprender mais sobre este mundo, ele descobre que nem tudo é como parecia.
pt.shortSynopsis: Otonashi acorda na vida após a morte e não consegue se lembrar de sua vida. Desesperado para sobreviver, ele se junta à SSS para lutar contra o Anjo.
pt.mediumSynopsis: Otonashi acorda na vida após a morte e descobre que não tem memórias de sua vida antes da morte. Desesperado para sobreviver em uma guerra que poderia resultar em outro destino infeliz, ele se junta à SSS na batalha contra o Anjo.
